page.title: 13LAW AND ORDER IN HAMBLEDON
page.content: {Hambledon}has its own policeman, P.C.Jones.He lives in the village police house and he has been in the village about 6 years.P.C.Jones mostly walks about the village but he also rides a bike and in emergencies he uses his own car.He works for 7 days and then he has 2 days off. Approximately{40%}of his time is taken up with community relations duties such as running the scout group or talking to the youth club.Another{40% of his work involves giving advice,for example,in matters of home security.{ {5%}of his time is taken up with the apprehension of criminals.The remaining{15%}includes such things as catching escaped animals,dealing with sudden deaths and with fire arms certificates.Theft from cars and burglaries are the commonest crimes in the area.
